content: पताकिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Having or carrying a banner, adorned with flags. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An ensign, standard-bearer. {@--2@} A flag. {@--3@} A scheme or figure for casting a nativity. --नी An army; (न प्रसेहे) रथवर्त्मरजोऽप्यस्य कुत एव पताकिनीं <ls>R. 4. 82</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 27.</ls>
